title: bafqqqq
author: bafqqqq
content: Venom Foundation, a blockchain project focusing on creating infrastructure for Web3, has made headlines with the announcement of its $1 billion fund for investments in innovative startups and projects aimed at advancing this new digital landscape.Founded by an experienced team with a long history in blockchain and cryptocurrency, Venom Foundation has an ambitious goal ‚Äî to build an extended infrastructure for the Web3 ecosystem. According to official reports, the fund actively plans to collaborate with innovative startups, developers, and projects to support their ideas and contribute to their further development.Currently, Web3 is experiencing impressive growth and attracting the attention of both investors and tech giants. Projects operating in this sphere have significant potential to transform the Internet by decentralizing data storage and exchange, giving users more control over their digital footprint.The launch of the $1 billion Venom Foundation fund reflects the growing interest in the Web3 ecosystem and underscores the desire to accelerate its development. While specific details of investment projects are not yet announced, this announcement serves as strong evidence of the positive changes expected in this important segment of the crypto world.In the testnet campaign, there are quests, and 22% of tokens are allocated for the community. So, it‚Äôs worth not to miss such a project.Preparation for Task Completion:Visit the website and download the Venom Wallet (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/venom-wallet/ojggmchlghnjlapmfbnjholfjkiidbch/related).Follow the link(https://venom.network/tasks), connect your wallet, Twitter, and subscribe to the project‚Äôs Twitter account.Next, claim 50 VENOM tokens.Afterward, you will see tasks that need to be completed; this will help test the network.If you have questions, you can ask them, I will be happy to help you pass the quests.https://vlad-nemoqqq.medium.com/
